cause.description:
The mission is achieved through four Desired Outcomes: Bible translation (into languages where Scripture does not exist]; Scripture Use [which includes Literacy and Vernacular Media], Recruitment of new missionaries, and Partnerships with prospective donors and prayer partners as well as partnerships with church bodies and mission agencies around the world.
Over 78 language programs (which includes Bible translation, Scripture Use, and Literacy work) are operating in over 19 countries around the world. Programs are operating in 56 individual languages.
1. Access to information in one's own language is a basic human right.
2. God speaks to people in their own language.
3. Access to and the skills to effectively use Scripture in one's own language are vital to discipleship.
cause.mission: To help bring people to faith in Jesus Christ by making the Word of God available to those who do not yet have it in the language of their hearts.
cause.name: Lutheran Bible Translators
